Question: The surreal, humorous this person reemerged on "I Shall Be Free No. 10" and "Motorpsycho Nightmare".
Hints: This person's 1990s began with Under the Red Sky (1990), an about-face from the serious Oh Mercy.
Allen Ginsberg accompanied the troupe, staging scenes for the film this person was simultaneously shooting.
By the end of 1963, this person felt both manipulated and constrained by the folk and protest movements.
